[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView] adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITraitEnvironment] protocol and expose this property.

# traitCollection

**Instance Property**

The traits, such as the size class and scale factor, that describe the current environment of the object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var traitCollection: UITraitCollection { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView] adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITraitEnvironment] protocol and expose this property.
title: traitCollection
